short_description: talent cricket is a sporting goods store based in loughborough, united kingdom.
long_description: from the biggest brands to the smallest of accessories, you'll be bowled over by the incredible range of cricket equipment available online. from cricket shoes to cricket bats our 1250 square foot showroom ensures we have every type of professional cricket equipment and junior cricket equipment you'll ever need. from cricket bats to batting gloves and batting helmets to wicket keeping whatever your cricket equipment needs, we'll meet them. find all the major brands such as adidas, salix, hunts county, newbery, new balance, masuri, gray nicolls, gunn and moore and kookaburra under one convenient roof. what's more, benefit from competitive online pricing with our great customer service. we've been providing cricket equipment since 1992, for unrivalled choice and quality. paul and sarah have great pleasure in welcoming you to talent cricket's new look online store. talent cricket was established in 1992, and we are located in the heart of the midlands in loughborough, leicestershire. our aim since we started out has been to provide unrivalled choice, the finest products, attractive prices, friendly expert advice and above all great service.

generated_description: talent cricket, legally known as talent cricket ltd., is a company based in loughborough, england, specializing in the sale of a wide range of cricket equipment. established in 1992, the company offers products such as cricket bats, helmets, gloves, cricket balls, shoes, and junior cricket equipment. talent cricket is known for its extensive selection, competitive pricing, and expert advice. the company also provides services like bat repair, a free knocking-in service on selected bats, and a club clothing service. talent cricket maintains a 1250 square foot showroom and maintains strong relationships with manufacturers to ensure high-quality products.
